briefTitle: A Study to Investigate the Effects of Tibolone (Livial®) on Breast Tissue in Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer (Study 32971)(P06469)
officialTitle: A Exploratory, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Trial to Investigate the Tissue Specific Effects of 2.5 mg Tibolone on Breast Cancer in Postmenopausal Women, in Particular on Breast Tissue Proliferation.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The primary objective of this trial was to compare changes in the expression of the proliferation marker Ki-67 in malignant breast tissue after treatment with tibolone or placebo.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* postmenopausal women of any age
* requiring surgery for early invasive primary breast cancer (clinically stage I or II; T1-T3; N0-1; M0), with estrogen receptor-positive tumor(s)
* body mass index between 18 and 2 kg/m2, inclusive
* must be willing to give voluntary written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* healthy subjects
